function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate precautionary measures in sports facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of comprehensive and effective precautionary measures","Technologies":"HVAC systems, UV-C lighting, disinfection technologies","People":"Visitors, staff, athletes","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of quantifiable measures in the assessment","Impact":"Inability to accurately evaluate the effectiveness of precautionary measures","Mitigation":"Incorporation of quantitative data in the assessment process","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Research team, facility management","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Economic impacts on public and private sports organizations","Impact":"Financial strain and potential loss of resources","Mitigation":"Strategic financial planning and adaptation of operations","Technologies":"Financial analysis and forecasting tools","People":"Management of sports organizations","Owner":"Management of sports organizations"}]}
